# Standard Meshing based on Irregular data set

We construct a Meshing Standard based on a set of Data Points 

```{r}
nech = 40
extendmin = c(0,0)
extendmax = c(150,100)
data = Db_createFromBox(nech,extendmin, extendmax)
data
```

```{r}
p = ggplot()
p = p + plot.point(data)
p = p + plot.decoration(title="Display of Data Set")
ggPrint(p)
```

Creating the Meshing

```{r}
mesh1 = MeshEStandardExt()
err = mesh1$resetFromDb(data)
mesh1$display()
```

```{r}
p = ggplot()
p = p + plot.mesh(mesh1, flagApex=TRUE)
p = p + plot.decoration(title="Standard Meshing")
ggPrint(p)
```
